page.title: 03CASTLE AS TOURIST ATTRACTION
page.content: All age groups visit the castle, from babes in arms to old age pensioners. It seems to be most popular with young families because they can pursue a wide range of activities, although it is also quite popular with the elderly. The average size of a group visiting the castle is about three. The castle is visited by people from both home and abroad. It is reasonably popular with people living in the locality, some of whom take friends or relatives to visit it. Of foreigners who visit the castle, we found the majority to come from Europe and North America. Whilst down there, we saw Canadians, French people and some Pakistanis for instance.
